org.wso2.carbon.identity.entitlement.endpoint.auth

Interface EntitlementAuthenticationHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAuthHandler, OAuthHandler

    public interface EntitlementAuthenticationHandler
    Interface to be implemented by any type of authentication handlers that will be registered to authenticate Entitlement requests coming to Entitlement REST endpoints.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canHandle(org.apache.cxf.message.Message message, org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.model.ClassResourceInfo classResourceInfo)
      To check whether the given handler can authenticate the request by looking at the message, including headers.
      int getPriority()
      Returns the priority of the particular authentication handler implementation.
      boolean isAuthenticated(org.apache.cxf.message.Message message, org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.model.ClassResourceInfo classResourceInfo)
      If the authenticator can handle the request, decide whether the request is authenticated.
      void setPriority(int priority)
      Sets the priority of the particular authentication handler implementation.
      void setProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> authenticatorProperties)
      To set the properties specific to each authenticator
